title:
Apple Will Announce iPhone Sales Figures Today

After launching their new smartphone devices last month...

attachments.displayName:
Apple Will Announce iPhone Sales Figures Today

After launching their new smartphone devices last month, iPhone5S and  iPhone5c , Apple recorded a great success when it comes to the sales. They are planning to reveal the sales figures later today.

So far, Apple announced they managed to sell 9 million of new iPhones worldwide, during the first weekend and now they want to reveal  a total figure of all iPhone’s sold in the first month. In addition, they might reveal some details dealing the new iPadAir  and iPadMiniRetinasales   as well as the latest Apple iOS7 update acceptance among the users.

Stay tuned, for we will reveal those figures soon.
http://metropcsphones.net/

object.content:
Apple Will Announce iPhone Sales Figures Today

After launching their new smartphone devices last month, iPhone5S and  iPhone5c , Apple recorded a great success when it comes to the sales. They are planning to reveal the sales figures later today. 

So far, Apple announced they managed to sell 9 million of new iPhones worldwide, during the first weekend and now they want to reveal  a total figure of all iPhone’s sold in the first month. In addition, they might reveal some details dealing the new iPadAir  and iPadMiniRetinasales   as well as the latest Apple iOS7 update acceptance among the users. 

Stay tuned, for we will reveal those figures soon.
